org.apache.hadoop.tools.mapred

Class CopyMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
      • org.apache.hadoop.tools.mapred.CopyMapper

  • public class CopyMapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
    Mapper class that executes the DistCp copy operation. Implements the o.a.h.mapreduce.Mapper<> interface.
